item.title: Kria: Initial Thoughts
item.description: Kria Starter Kit Kria Recently released the Kria KV260 Vision AI Starter Kit, a SOM with the added benefit of a FPGA. Different in the fact that you should technically be able to add a 12v power supply and run AI models to your heart’s content. Inital Thoughts I like the Design of the Kria carrier board it has plenty of IO available. up to 32 concurrent streams are possible through a number of IAS and CSI camera connections.
